short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to calculate your capacity for a given iteration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tool to calculate your iteration capacity based on a number of provided factors and values.  Anyone using Agile planning tools will find this to be a helpful extension to help determine how many hours they are available each iteration.
